about_the_game:
The world has plunged into chaos and decay! Your train is the only thing protecting you from desert factions and their combat vehicles. You'll need to destroy them to collect their parts and make your train even more powerful to continue your journey. In procedurally generated maps, the challenges increase the further you advance, and your only hope is to grow your power faster than the challenges.

Route:
Reaching your destination is all that matters! Traverse a dynamic map filled with paths, hidden secrets, and aggressive factions. Choose your route wisely—the cities you encounter along the way will define your challenges, but also your rewards.

Make use of enemy spoils:
Destroy enemy vehicles and use their parts to upgrade your train. The more powerful the enemy, the more powerful the part. Each part has its own advantages, disadvantages, and synergies, so think carefully about which ones you will use. The more powerful they are, the greater their potential for destruction, but also for bringing you to ruin.

Plan your strategy:
The train is your hero, and the parts left by your opponents are your equipment. Combine the utility of your carriages with the power of your weapons and defenses to create synergies and annihilate all who stand against you.

name: Rogue Train: Fury Rail

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8250U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Rogue Train: Fury Rail is a roguelike auto-battler where you try to build the most powerful train of all. The goal is to reach your destination, armed cars will try to block your way. Create insane synergies between your weapons and wagons to break the game!
